input.sentences: i went to the park one afternoon .
afterward i hung out at the pier .
some people were playing music there .
i was getting hungry so i left to find something to eat .
i went to a restaurant to eat .
output.sentences: There is a beautiful home in the distance blocked by vegetation.
A huge white house sits next to the water front.
An elderly man sits and plays an traditional instrument.
A narrow water way is seen between tall brick buildings.
People sit at a sidewalk cafe and enjoy their time.
